title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for downloading, running, and managing large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, embedding, and model management.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM, chat, or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builders, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for integrating local Ollama models into Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built Node CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick prompts and model ops.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models for semantic search and generative pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama (Windows/Mac/Linux) with chat history and model switching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for integration testing of LLM features.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chatbot-react
summary: Boilerplate React chat UI (Next.js) that streams responses from Ollama over Server-Sent Events.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, generate flashcards, or ask questions via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Minimal Python package exposing Ollama’s embedding endpoint with numpy & sentence-transformers compatibility.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLMs into any server with slash commands and moderation filters.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for code, multilingual, and instruction-tuned models ready to pull.
